translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仕方がない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様がどうにかしてやるしかないのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess I'll have to do something about it myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、そういう訳だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that's how it is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お願いしますよ、総統閣下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm counting on you, Supreme Commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんかお前に言われると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Somehow, when you say it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬鹿にされてるようで気に食わんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it feels like I'm being mocked, and that irritates me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなつもりはないんだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't mean it like that though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジで頼りにしてるぜ、ボーヤ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm seriously counting on you, boy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そっちのほうがむかつくんじゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That actually pisses me off more!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ったく、俺以外の男は絶滅するべきだな……ん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, all men except me should be extinct... Hm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍議を終え、野営地を歩いていると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After finishing the military conference, while walking through the camp,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと視線の向こうで目に留まるものがあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: something caught my eye beyond my gaze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身なりのいい魔法兵が地面に座り込み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A well-dressed magic soldier was sitting on the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その傍らに荒くれた風貌の男が立っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and beside him stood a rough-looking man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おら、隊長がそんなとこでへたばってんなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Captain, don't just collapse over there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵に見られるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers will see you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、守備隊の……そうは言うが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, the guard unit... I know, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうも食事が取れないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if I can't get any food like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、お坊ちゃん上がりの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, you upper-class boys,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元一級市民様は、コレだからよー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: former first-class citizens, are like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと、貴様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What did you say, you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 荒くれた男が呆れたように頭を掻くと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The rough man scratched his head in disbelief,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プライドを刺激された魔法兵が睨みつける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the magic soldier, his pride provoked, glared back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それに続いて、あらくれ男が放ったのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But then, what the rough man threw out next was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一切れの肉だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a piece of meat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほれよ、干し肉。ゆっくり噛めよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here, some dried meat. Chew it slowly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なっ……なんのつもりだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Wha... What do you mean by that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちとら元二級市民だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm a former second-class citizen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食うや食わずには慣れてんだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm used to sometimes eating, sometimes not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと食え」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just eat it quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……」
「将軍様方から回ってきた食いモンなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The food passed down from the generals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下賤な身には口に合わないんでね。ほれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn't really suitable for lowly people like me. Here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう、だな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right...,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの方々も、自らの食事を削って、我々に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those people have even reduced their own meals to give to us..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法隊の男が立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magic team man stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでも、気を張っておられるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even so, they are holding themselves together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無様な姿は、見せられんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must not show a pathetic appearance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、そうだな。じゃあ、それは必要ないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, that's right. Then, I don't need it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……くれるなら貰う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... if you're giving it, I'll take it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい根性してやがるな、おい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have some guts, hey!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、あれ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance, that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大変ですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's terrible, isn't it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……つい、ほんの数年前まで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Until just a few years ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスは、劣悪な人種差別国家だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth was a brutally racist state."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法を使える者と、使えぬ者を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who could use magic and those who couldn't,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一級市民、二級市民と区別……いや、差別し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were divided into first-class citizens and second-class citizens... no, discriminated against,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後者を虐げ、家畜扱いしてまったく憚らなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: oppressing the latter and treating them like livestock without any hesitation."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right...,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの方々も、自らの食事を削って、我々に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those people have even reduced their own meals to give to us..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法隊の男が立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magic team man stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでも、気を張っておられるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even so, they are holding themselves together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無様な姿は、見せられんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must not show a pathetic appearance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、そうだな。じゃあ、それは必要ないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, that's right. Then, I don't need it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……くれるなら貰う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... if you're giving it, I'll take it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい根性してやがるな、おい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have some guts, hey!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、あれ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance, that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大変ですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's terrible, isn't it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……つい、ほんの数年前まで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Until just a few years ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスは、劣悪な人種差別国家だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth was a brutally racist state."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法を使える者と、使えぬ者を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who could use magic and those who couldn't,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一級市民、二級市民と区別……いや、差別し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were divided into first-class citizens and second-class citizens... no, discriminated against,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後者を虐げ、家畜扱いしてまったく憚らなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: oppressing the latter and treating them like livestock without any hesitation."
